<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Glory and Valor!](/Feats.aspx?ID=7211) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=541" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=579" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=623" />
<trait label="Nephilim" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=518" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [War of Immortals](/Sources.aspx?ID=232) pg. 54

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Battleblooded](/Feats.aspx?ID=7196)

</column>

---

You call upon your ascendant blood with a mighty cry that fills you with a revitalizing energy for 1 minute or until you critically fail a Strike, whichever comes first. For the duration, the first time each round you successfully Strike a creature of your level or higher, you regain Hit Points equal to half your level.
name: Glory and Valor!
